dct_description_sm: Includes comparison of routes: "La longueur de la route depuis le Vernet jusqu'a Salces est de 12,624" : "La longueur de la ligne proposée (par Rivesaltes) serait de 13, 368" : "Différence...0,744."
Shows "chemins," drainage, "Route Royale No. 9 de Paris à Perpignan," administrative boundary of Rivesaltes (?), small unnamed settlements.
Text surrounding map indicates nearby towns.
Early 1800s date derived from lack of railroads on map.
